name: BreakEven
description:
Your proud nation is sinking deeper into debt with each passing second. Your mission: raid a military base in neighbouring Plentania and steal their money and valuables, while fighting off the Plentanian army.

The deeper your nation's debts grow, the deeper into the base you will have to venture...

Features:

  • Five levels
  • A fully-fledged storyline
  • A lot of glitches UPDATED: Now with 70% fewer glitches!

Controls:

  • Arrows: Move
  • Z: Shoot/Advance through dialogue

Changelog:

  • 28/04/2021: Fixed the broken collision detection and a few minor issues

Made using the TIC-80 game engine.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48.
